questions.text: 1. People who arrive more than 30 minutes ____ the opera begins should wait in the lobby until the doors to the main hall are opened.
2. First-class seats ____ with a fully reclining seat, workstation, TV, and a global telephone for the convenience of Turkey Airline's passengers.
3. Attendees of the conference who wish to stay near the venue are ____ to book their hotel early.
4. Additionally, we will be honoring ____ coupons during the sale.
5. ...each customer will be strictly limited to ____ a maximum of five pairs of discounted shoes.
6. If this limit is surpassed, regular prices will apply for the remaining purchases. ____ We thank you in advance for your cooperation in making this sale accessible for all.
choices: A) Although our products are slightly used, we redecorate them as necessary.
B) We are affiliated with many smaller shoe stores in the area.
C) If this limit is surpassed, regular prices will apply for the remaining purchases.
D) Our website is currently being updated to reflect these prices.
questions.correctAnswer: C) If this limit is surpassed, regular prices will apply for the remaining purchases.

questions.text: 7. Remember to take advantage of this weekend of great deals, ____ your next favorite pair of shoes is waiting for you right here at Gordon's!
8. What job is the vacancy closest to in terms of the duties involved?
questions.teacherCorrection: The correct answer is 'C) An administrative assistant' because the job involves duties typical of administrative support, such as guiding clients, managing schedules, and providing customer service.

questions.text: 9. What qualification is NOT mentioned as a requirement for the job?
choices: B) Skill in handling electronic documents
C) An ability to deal with customers
questions.teacherCorrection: The correct answer is 'D) Written communication skills.' The advertisement specifically requires a degree, customer service ability, and document handling skills, but does not explicitly mention written communication skills.

choices: A) The payment has still not been received
B) The firm has used an inaccurate mailing address
C) The government has imposed sanctions on shipping
D) Unexpected circumstances have affected the delivery
questions.correctAnswer: D) Unexpected circumstances have affected the delivery
questions.teacherCorrection: The correct answer is 'D) Unexpected circumstances have affected the delivery.' The email specifies that a wildfire and resulting road closures are the reason for the delay.
The woman is facing the monitor.
At least 50 people, the questions expects a number of people that will be coming in teh future.

questions.text: 13. What are the man and woman mainly discussing?
questions.teacherCorrection: The subject of the conversation is a conference that they are attending
The woman is travelling by bus.

questions.text: 15. Why aren't the man and woman going together?
choices: A) The woman needs to arrive earlier.
B) The man has to work overtime.
C) The man has to work overtime.
D) The man has to go to the bank first.
questions.correctAnswer: C) The woman dislikes air travel.

questions.text: 16. What does the speaker say about the repair?
choices: B) It has been finished early.
D) It is covered by a warranty.
questions.correctAnswer: B) It has been finished early.
questions.teacherCorrection: The repair has been completed ahead of schedule.

questions.text: 17. When can the listener pick up his car?
questions.teacherCorrection: They are closing for the day so he can come pick up his car anytime tomorrow

questions.text: 18. What does the speaker offer to do?
choices: A) Look for a used part
B) Refund the cost of a charge
questions.teacherCorrection: He can arrange a ride for the customer to come to the repair shop.
